statements: SELECT * FROM genetic_data WHERE participant_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT gene_sequence, research_area FROM genetic_data WHERE mutation_type = 'Point Mutation';
SELECT participant_id, gene_sequence, mutation_type FROM genetic_data WHERE research_area = 'Cancer Research';
SELECT research_area FROM genetic_data GROUP BY research_area;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM genetic_data;
SELECT * FROM genetic_data WHERE mutation_type = 'insertion';
SELECT participant_id, research_area FROM genetic_data WHERE mutation_type = 'deletion' ORDER BY participant_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT research_area FROM genetic_data WHERE gene_sequence LIKE '%ACGT%' ORDER BY research_area ASC;
SELECT * FROM genetic_data WHERE mutation_type = 'substitution' AND research_area = 'Cancer' LIMIT 10;
SELECT participant_id, COUNT(*) AS mutation_count FROM genetic_data GROUP BY participant_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY mutation_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Researcher;
SELECT id, name FROM Researcher ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM Researcher WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM GeneticData WHERE researcher_id = 2;
SELECT id, data FROM GeneticData ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Researcher WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Researcher WHERE id > 5;
SELECT r.id, r.name, gd.data FROM Researcher r INNER JOIN GeneticData gd ON r.id = gd.researcher_id;
SELECT r.name, gd.data FROM Researcher r INNER JOIN GeneticData gd ON r.id = gd.researcher_id WHERE r.id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT r.id, r.email, gd.data FROM Researcher r LEFT JOIN GeneticData gd ON r.id = gd.researcher_id;
SELECT * FROM patient_information;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM patient_information WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, result_summary, analysis_date FROM research_results ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM patient_information;
SELECT MIN(age), MAX(age), AVG(age) FROM patient_information;
SELECT * FROM patient_information;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM patient_information WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, data_type, data_value, data_unit FROM genetic_data WHERE data_type = 'blood_pressure';
SELECT patient_id, result_summary FROM research_results ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, ethnicity, has_family_history FROM patient_information WHERE ethnicity = 'Asian' AND has_family_history = true;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT sample_name, sample_type FROM samples ORDER BY sample_name DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, start_date FROM experiments WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT result_data FROM results WHERE sample_id = 3 AND experiment_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT sample_name, sample_type FROM samples WHERE researcher_id = 2 ORDER BY sample_name ASC;
SELECT experiment_name, end_date FROM experiments WHERE researcher_id = 3 AND start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT result_data FROM results r JOIN samples s ON r.sample_id = s.sample_id WHERE s.sample_type = 'DNA';
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM researchers r JOIN experiments e ON r.researcher_id = e.researcher_id GROUP BY researcher_name, research_area;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, specialization FROM Researchers WHERE affiliation = 'University A';
SELECT * FROM Samples WHERE sample_type = 'DNA';
SELECT gene_name, gene_function FROM Genes WHERE analysis_type = 'RNA-Seq';
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM Experiments ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, specialization FROM Researchers;
SELECT * FROM Samples WHERE researcher_id = 1 ORDER BY sample_name DESC;
SELECT gene_name, gene_function FROM Genes WHERE analysis_type = 'Sequencing';
SELECT * FROM Mutations WHERE mutation_type LIKE '%insertion%';
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM Experiments WHERE researcher_id = 2 ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
